parameters.content:
## ğŸ“š KB LOADING

Loads FAQ from URL if kb_url provided, else uses embedded 5-item KB.
- Input: kb_url (optional)
- Output: { kb: [{ id, title, content }] }

## ğŸ” RETRIEVAL
BM25 (orange): keyword relevance
Embeddings (purple): semantic cosine

parameters.jsCode:
const j = $input.first().json;
return [{ json: { doc_embeddings: Array.isArray(j.data) ? j.data.map(d=>d.embedding) : [], texts: j.texts || [], meta: j.meta || [], question: j.question, mode: j.mode || "emb" } }];

parameters.content:
## ğŸ¤– LLM PROCESSING
Build prompt -> call Claude via OpenRouter -> parse JSON

parameters.jsCode: const j=$input.first().json; return [{ json: { question:j.question, mode:j.mode, retrieval:j.retrieval, retrieval_conf:j.retrieval_conf } }];

parameters.content:
## ğŸ“¤ OUTPUT
Shape success JSON or error JSON for webhook response

parameters.jsCode: const j=$input.first().json; return [{ json: { input: { question:j.question, mode:j.mode }, result: j.result } }];

const j=$input.first().json; const errMsg=j.message||"Agent failed to answer."; return [{ json: { error:true, message:errMsg, details:j.details ?? null, hint:"Ensure 'question' is provided and that OpenRouter key and KB are valid." } }];
